text: The Belarus men's national field hockey team represents Belarus in men's international field hockey and is controlled by the Belarus Hockey Federation, the governing body for field hockey in Belarus. ==Competitive record== ===World Cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !colspan=10|FIH World Cup record |- !Year !Round !Position !
